title: U.S. Dollar Typeface? Help please :)
content:
Does anyone know the typeface used on the back of U.S. Dollar Bills?  
The typeface they use to write on the back of the bill for example, "Fifty Dollars" ?

I would greatly appreciate it! Thanks :)
author: catastrophe

comments.content:
It's custom engraved, but [Federal](http://web.archive.org/web/20141009124534/http:/www.letterror.com/catalog/fed/index.html) is close.

- Lex

Archive Garfield is somewhat close as well, but has a very specific look to it.

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-garfield/](http://web.archive.org/web/20141009124534/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-garfield/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/archivetype/archive-garfield/")

-steve
